full_summary:
===============

**Tender Title:** Saltwater Intake and Pumphouse Upgrade
**English Title:** F1700-230184
**French Title:** Amélioration de la prise d'eau salée et de la station de pompage
**Reference Number:** WS4220242905-Doc4220397397
**Amendment Number:** 0
**Solicitation Number:** WS4220242905
**Publication Date:** September 19, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 4, 2023
**Amendment Date:** September 19, 2023

**Tender Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to submit their bid for the Saltwater Intake and Pumphouse Upgrade project at the Fisheries and Oceans Canada - Pacific Science Enterprise Centre (PSEC) facility.

This project entails the upgrade of the pumphouse and saltwater intakes facilities, which will include:

* Construction of three new saltwater intakes, including HDPE pipes, weights, fittings, intake structures, vault, and appurtenances
* Excavation for intake trenches, including dewatering and shoring as required, and subtidal burial as specified
* Restoration of existing surrounding components, such as vegetation and shoreline landscape
* Commissioning of intakes, including testing and flushing as applicable

**Contract Details:**

* The project falls under the category of Competitive - Selective tendering
* The selection criteria is based on the lowest price
* The project is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* The regions of delivery include Canada and British Columbia
* The expected contract start date is not specified, but the expected contract end date is March 31, 2024

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact:

Simon Leung
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Tel: (phone number not specified)
Email: [simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Notice URL:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17491864?extsite=MTc0OTE4NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5
